title: Spain deputy PM: Police action proportional and firm
description:
(1 Oct 2017) Spain's deputy prime minister on Sunday said Spanish police have intervened with "firmness and proportionality" against the Catalan vote on secession.
Soraya Saenz de Santamaria said authorities acted in a professional and proportional way, and they weren't going after voters, but referendum material.
She accused the Catalan government which is trying to hold the referendum of behaving irresponsibly.
